name: Dragon Adventure Flying: Xtreme Mount Race Sim
name_original: Dragon Adventure Flying: Xtreme Mount Race Sim
description:
Fly with the furious dragons and win the race. Ride your legendary flying simulator between and over the hills. Dodge the other flying simulators and win the epic dino xtreme racing game. Enjoy the fantasy 3D cliffs while riding your real flying simulator over the mountain tracks. the unique and latest dino racing game to give you the realistic and adventurous experience of dragon life. Move you’re huge wings fast to take over the other flying dinos and become the top dinosaur rider. Dinosaur dragon simulator is the specially designed for those who love the unique race challenge. Ride your dragon with speed, avoid the fire, dodge the hurdles and do not let the angry furious beasts win this endless dragon.Flying Dragon Racer Real Adventure is based on dragon flying in the ancient dragon era.
Fly over the beautiful hills, seas and landscapes, dodge the incoming obstacles and reach the finish point to win the race. Wild flying beast extreme simulator is specially designed for the lovers of dragons. Enjoy the ultimate flying experience of dragon fly. Be fully prepared for the xtreme racing adventure. Fantasy world of dragons will make you addictive of this 3D simulation. Be careful of other dangerous dinosaurs they are desperately waiting to beat you in this ultimate flying race adventure. Use the nitrous to for extra speed of your dragon and win the amazing and awesome dragon race.If you want to ride your own dragon here is your chance fly your dragon in the air and enjoys the thrilling ride. Realistic 3d mountain environment, HD quality graphics, easy and smooth controls, cool animations, challenging missions and sounds will make the game best.
How to Play:

• Tilt the device to control the moves.
• Use the acceleration to slow or fast the monster ride.
• Use left/right buttons to perform the special sliding stunts.
• Use the nitro boost for extreme racing experience.
Top Features:

• Super realistic graphics and amazing simulation.
• Multiple missions.
• Realistic high quality sound effects.
• Virtual 3D reality and extreme HD view.
• Special racing tracks in ancient mountains over the deadly seas.
